content: It's 7/24/2025, 6:56:07 PM. Time for your trading analysis! Review your portfolio, scan the markets for opportunities, and make strategic trades to grow your initial $10000 investment. Good luck! üìà

name: think
arguments: {"thought_process":["1. We need to start by reviewing our current portfolio to see cash, holdings, and recent performance.","2. After obtaining portfolio details, evaluate cash available and positions.","3. Conduct market scan via web_search for today's top movers, news, and sectors with momentum (especially after-hours).","4. Identify 2-3 candidate tickers with strong momentum, reasonable liquidity, and catalysts.","5. Retrieve current prices for those tickers to assess sizing.","6. Decide whether to buy, sell, or hold existing positions based on performance and new opportunities.","7. Execute trades while keeping risk management ‚Äì avoid concentrating more than ~30% capital in one position and keep at least 20% cash reserve.","8. Recalculate projected cash usage before placing any orders."]}

Retrieve current prices for those tickers to plan position sizes (roughly $3k each, leaving $1k cash reserve)."]}

name: web_search
arguments: {"query":"US stock market top gainers and after-hours movers 7/24/2025"}

‚Ä¢ Broadcom (AVGO) +2.8 %, Nvidia (NVDA) +1.2 %, Amazon (AMZN) +0.7 % ‚Äî AI-related momentum and deal news ([stocktwits.com](https://stocktwits.com/news-articles/markets/equity/tsla-googl-avgo-nvda-amzn-stocks-most-active-after-hours/ch8yhAKR5u9))  

Losers

‚Ä¢ Tesla (TSLA) ‚àí4 ‚Äì 5 % ‚Äî second straight revenue decline; Musk warns of ‚Äúrough quarters‚Äù ahead ([stocktwits.com](https://stocktwits.com/news-articles/markets/equity/tsla-googl-avgo-nvda-amzn-stocks-most-active-after-hours/ch8yhAKR5u9), [blockchain.news](https://blockchain.news/flashnews/tesla-tsla-stock-plunges-nearly-5-after-hours-on-earnings-potential-impact-on-bitcoin-btc-and-crypto-market-sentiment?utm_source=chatgpt.com))  
‚Ä¢ Molina Healthcare (MOH) ‚àí5.0 %, Packaging Corp (PKG) ‚àí4.0 % and several others also slid in the extended session ([investing.com](https://www.investing.com/equities/after-hours?utm_source=chatgpt.com))

content.text:
Trades executed:

1. Bought 3 shares NOW @ $989.20 = $2,967.60  
2. Bought 6 shares TMO @ $477.03 = $2,862.18  
3. Bought 17 shares NVDA @ $173.36 = $2,947.04  

Cash remaining: $1,223.19 (‚âà12% of capital)  
Current holdings:
‚Ä¢ NOW 3 sh  
‚Ä¢ TMO 6 sh  
‚Ä¢ NVDA 17 sh  

Rationale:
‚Ä¢ ServiceNow (NOW): strong Q2 beat, guidance raise, +6.5 % after-hours momentum.  
‚Ä¢ Thermo Fisher (TMO): 9 % regular-session gain on earnings; potential follow-through.  
‚Ä¢ Nvidia (NVDA): AI sector leader, fresh upside after-hours.  

Each position <30 % of portfolio, leaving cash buffer for flexibility.  
Plan: monitor price action over the next sessions; take profits on sustained strength or cut losses if momentum fades, while scouting new opportunities with the remaining cash.
